meanings.definition: A loose-fitting blouse worn over other clothing.
meanings.sent1: She wore a pretty overblouse to the party.
meanings.sent2: The overblouses in the store were all colorful and flowy.
meanings.sent3: The overblouse danced in the wind as she walked down the street.
meanings.sent4: Her overblouse was like a gentle cloud floating above her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The overblouse fluttered like a butterfly around her shoulders.

meanings.definition: To wear or put on an overblouse.
meanings.sent1: She overblouses every morning before heading out.
meanings.sent2: I need to overblouse this top to complete my outfit.
meanings.sent3: He overblouses with such style and grace.
meanings.sent4: She overblouses as if each piece of clothing tells a story.
meanings.sent5: Overblousing adds a touch of elegance to her look.
